name: MEC Crux Gloves - Unisex
description:
Great for wet, cold coastal mountain days or warmish days in the East. The Crux are light enough to keep you dexterous but warm enough for on-mountain action. A waterproof-breathable membrane and light insulation get you through the windchill for a last run or extra pitch. The shaped design and curved fingers allow you leave your gloves on to adjust your bindings, harnesses or other small fiddly things.100g Thermolite® Micro synthetic insulation is bluesign approved.DWR finish and a sewn-in waterproof-breathable lining keep you dry.Doubled layer leather palm, anchored with 2 rows of Kevlar® stitching.Textured palm aids gripping tools or poles.Leather finger and knuckle protection.Soft fleece lining wicks moisture.Anatomic patterning, subtle pre-curved fingers and an articulated thumb combine for incredible dexterity.Short gauntlet cuff has a gusseted hook-and-loop closure.Short cuff loops make pulling on the gloves a cinch.Clip to keep them together.
